course_description: Evolutionary Game Theory draws on ideas from classic Game Theory to explain these biological phenomena. The course will introduce basic concepts from Evolutionary Biology and from Game Theory, and combine them together to find evolutionarily stable strategies everywhere around us.
schedule_location: TTh 1pm-2:15pm in Math & Science Center - N304
